casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Alanna R. CAREY Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 27, 2019

"Did the Appellate Court correctly conclude that the allegedly improper admission of Mark Manganello's hearsay testimony was harmless?"

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn.App. 438, 202 A.3d 1067 (2019), is granted, limited to the following issue:
